title: Textile, 1930–31
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
inscribed: On left edge: "V. W. J SOLABELLA"
dimensions:
H x W: 36.5 x 126 cm (14 3/8 x 49 5/8 in.)
Repeat H: 28 x 33 cm (11 x 13 in.)
description: Dense floral pattern with butterfly hovering over a tulip in light colors. 6 colors or blocks: 2 pinks, 2 greys, yellow, blue. Light pink printed over blue, yellow printed over darker pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1930–31.
1930–31. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Teresa Kilham. 1958-88-11.
